# Dr. Lesa Mulligan MD - OBGYN Norman Oklahoma

> Board-certified OBGYN surgeon serving patients across Oklahoma with 30+ years of experience in women's health and minimally invasive surgery.

## About

Dr. Lesa Mulligan is a board-certified Obstetrician-Gynecologist and surgeon based in Norman, Oklahoma. She specializes in minimally invasive robotic surgery and urogynecologic procedures, along with comprehensive women's healthcare including pregnancy care and hormone therapy.

## Quick Facts

- Name: Dr. Lesa Mulligan, MD
- Specialty: Obstetrics and Gynecology
- Experience: 30+ years
- Board Certified: American Board of Obstetrics and Gynecology
- Location: Norman, Oklahoma
- Service Area: All of Oklahoma

## Contact

- Phone: (405) 364-0643
- Address: 1139 NW 36th St Suite 100, Norman, OK 73072
- Website: https://lesamulligan.com

## Surgical Services

- Minimally Invasive Robotic Surgery
- Urogynecologic Surgery
- Laparoscopic Procedures
- Pelvic Floor Repair
- Hysterectomy (minimally invasive)

## Other Services

- Gynecological Procedures
- Annual Well-Woman Exams
- Pap Smears and Cancer Screenings
- Normal Pregnancy Care
- High-Risk Pregnancy Care
- Prenatal Care
- Hormone Therapy
- Menopause Management
- Contraception Counseling

## Insurance

Accepts Medicare, Medicaid, Blue Cross Blue Shield, UnitedHealthCare, Aetna, Cigna, Humana, and most major insurance plans.

## Affiliations

- Norman Regional Healthplex
- Absentee Shawnee Tribe

## Hours

- Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Tuesday closes at 12:00 PM)
- Saturday-Sunday: Closed
